snippet.title: Mega Drive Longplay [040] The Immortal
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.net

Played by: RIckyC

Looking back I think i prefer this version over the amiga one but its close. The one think i much prefer was the fights in the amiga version even though it didn't have the fatalites after them like this one. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
